context: Just talking with a friend today who has a relative working for Raytheon.  Sounds like some pretty amazing things going on with this work.  Would be great if we can keep everybody and his Chinese brother from scooping it up.
Im going to be killed by a robot

replies.context: It will still be considered WuFlu. Betcha.

context:
Artificial intelligence...
Isn't that what you get when a blonde dies her hair brown?
I hope this is true... but, it could be propaganda to slow down the proliferation of drones in rogue states, and illegal activities...
Hey Fox why don't you just hand Iran, China, Russia........ the complete manual with the instruction book.

replies.context: We really shouldn't be publishing this stuff.  All admins seem to do it, and I gotta wonder if it is deliberate.  Leading foreign govts down the wrong trail...imo.

context:
Q: Well, I'll hazard I can do more damage on my laptop sitting in my pajamas before my first cup of Earl Grey than you can do in a year in the field.
James Bond: Oh, so why do you need me?
Q: Every now and then a trigger has to be pulled.
James Bond: Or not pulled. It's hard to know which in your pajamas.

I've read the examples of real conversations.  The cyber criminals don't use indef articles.  This means they  are most likely Chinese or Russian.  They sound especially stupid, and honestly, I give more credit to the Russians.  The convos definitely sound either Chinese or Indonesian.  Indians are another possibility, but they too are not this stupid.  Research it online and you will see what I mean.
